messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

move project data and costs to different job codes move costs different job codes hi recently had issue resolved create job codes different entity initial codes created had wrong entity initial codes were recently renamed follows old old old old codes possible forecasting costs etc over old codes codes how work thank senior
